Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அற்றது அறிந்து கடைப்பிடித்து மாறல்ல துய்க்க துவரப் பசித்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: (First) assure yourself that your food has been digested and never fail to eat, when very hungry, whatever is not disagreeable (to you).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown having followed the first rule: they have waited until their previous meal is digested and they are now truly hungry ('துவரப் பசித்து').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Before them is a spread of food. They are shown carefully selecting only the foods that are agreeable and suitable for their body ('மாறல்ல துய்க்க'), while rejecting those that are not.
Layered_Composition.Background: This disciplined and mindful choice is the firm practice ('கடைப்பிடித்து') that ensures their continued health and well-being.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The practice for good health: once digested and very hungry, choose and eat only foods that are agreeable to your system.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The act of careful selection from a variety of foods is the key visual. The rejected, 'disagreeable' foods can be shown as slightly darker or less appealing.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A clean, natural, and wholesome light. The agreeable foods look fresh and vibrant, while the disagreeable ones look slightly off.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot from the person's point of view, showing their hands making the wise choice of foods.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with delicious and realistic-looking food textures.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Hyper-realistic still life, with a narrative element.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: person eating disagreeable food, not being hungry, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the spread of food.
